title: Re: Wait, WHAT? Rob Reiner predicts how ‚Äòdemocracy‚Äô will be saved as irony spotters have a field day
text:
Yeah, but you have to win elections and all that and people like Sally Kohn would rather have Hillary installed as the nation‚Äôs leader without delay , and Reiner would no doubt be applauding the whole time. ‚ÄúThe intelligence community must destroy the president in order to save democracy.‚Äù https://t.co/3fTKffNHKf 
‚Äî Charles C. W. Cooke (@charlescwcooke) February 17, 2017 Whoever put money on "2017: Hollywood liberals will advocate an intelligence coup against the sitting President" can collect their winnings pic.twitter.com/vORjdbHqbz

‚Äî Karl Sharro (@KarlreMarks) February 17, 2017 Translation "The unelected shadow government must destroy the democratically elected President to save democracy." üòÇ Orwellian case study! üòÇ https://t.co/kLxnLxAuap

Between Reiner‚Äôs intelligence community coup and Sarah Silverman‚Äôs military coup , Hollywood‚Äôs doing a lot of coup-ing lately.
